statements: SELECT * FROM green_buildings_air_quality_measurements;
SELECT building_id, temperature, humidity FROM green_buildings_air_quality_measurements;
SELECT * FROM green_buildings_air_quality_measurements WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT building_id, measurement_time, co2_level FROM green_buildings_air_quality_measurements ORDER BY co2_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM green_buildings_air_quality_measurements WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM green_buildings_air_quality_measurements WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT building_id, temperature, humidity FROM green_buildings_air_quality_measurements WHERE co2_level > 1000 ORDER BY measurement_time ASC;
SELECT building_id, measurement_time FROM green_buildings_air_quality_measurements WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 50;
SELECT AVG(co2_level) AS avg_co2, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM green_buildings_air_quality_measurements WHERE measurement_time BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT building_id, temperature, humidity, co2_level FROM green_buildings_air_quality_measurements WHERE humidity < 30 OR co2_level > 1200 ORDER BY building_id ASC, measurement_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Green_Building_Air_Quality_Measurements;
SELECT building_id, temperature, humidity FROM Green_Building_Air_Quality_Measurements WHERE CO2_level > 1000;
SELECT measurement_id, measurement_time, temperature, humidity FROM Green_Building_Air_Quality_Measurements WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, location, year_built FROM Green_Building_Details WHERE building_type = 'Office';
SELECT building_id, measurement_time, CO2_level FROM Green_Building_Air_Quality_Measurements ORDER BY measurement_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Green_Building_Air_Quality_Measurements ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;

SELECT building_name, temperature, humidity FROM Green_Building_Air_Quality_Measurements JOIN Green_Building_Details ON Green_Building_Air_Quality_Measurements.building_id = Green_Building_Details.building_id WHERE CO2_level > 1000;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM Green_Building_Air_Quality_Measurements WHERE building_id = 3;
SELECT building_name, location FROM Green_Building_Details WHERE year_built > 2000 AND building_type = 'Office' ORDER BY building_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_measurements FROM Green_Building_Air_Quality_Measurements WHERE measurement_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Measurements;
SELECT id, timestamp, co2_level FROM Measurements ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT temperature, co2_level FROM Measurements WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, type FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Room 101';
SELECT * FROM Buildings WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Measurements WHERE co2_level > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM Measurements WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT name, address FROM Buildings WHERE name ILIKE 'C%' AND address ILIKE '%Street';
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Room A' AND type = 'CO2';
SELECT id, type, location FROM Sensors WHERE type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM IndoorAirQualityMeasurements;
SELECT id, building_id, measurement_time FROM IndoorAirQualityMeasurements ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_type, location, building_id FROM Sensors WHERE building_id = 2 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM IndoorAirQualityMeasurements WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY measurement_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings WHERE building_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_type, location, building_id FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'CO2 Sensor';
SELECT username, email, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM IndoorAirQualityMeasurements WHERE humidity < 50 AND co2_level > 100 ORDER BY measurement_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Buildings;
SELECT building_name, location FROM Buildings;
SELECT room_name, room_type, building_id FROM Rooms ORDER BY building_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_id FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_id < 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Buildings WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT building_name, location FROM Buildings WHERE building_id = 3;
SELECT room_name, room_type, building_name FROM Rooms JOIN Buildings ON Rooms.building_id = Buildings.building_id WHERE Rooms.room_type = 'Conference Room';
SELECT sensor_type, measurement_value, measurement_time FROM Sensors JOIN Measurements ON Sensors.sensor_id = Measurements.sensor_id WHERE Sensors.room_id = 1 ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
